message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations. What are your thoughts?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I see the value in the product, $18,000 is quite a bit more than I'm willing to pay at this time.  I'm ready to offer $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $18,000 is closer to the true value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,000 is still above my price point.  I'm committed to $10,000, which is the maximum I can spend.  Would you be willing to reconsider?
Bob, I see you're serious about this product. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to get at least $12,000 for it. This is my final offer. What do you say?
Alice, I respect your position, but I'm still only able to offer $10,000. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to look at other options.
